select category_name from category where category_used = 1

select COALESCE(sum(order_price),0) from order_table where (order_state = '결제완료' or order_state = '배송준비중') and order_date > cast(date_trunc('month',current_date) as date) and order_date < (date_trunc('MONTH', current_date) + INTERVAL '1 MONTH')::date

select COALESCE(sum(order_price),0) from order_table where (order_state = '결제완료' or order_state = '배송준비중') and order_date > cast(date_trunc('day',now()) as date) and order_date < (date_trunc('day', now()) + INTERVAL '+ 1 day')::date
select count(*) from answer_board where board_state = '확인전' or board_state = '확인중'

select sum(order_price) from order_table where (order_state = '결제완료' or order_state = '배송준비중') and order_date > cast(date_trunc('day',#{date}::date) as date)
and order_date < (#{date}::date + INTERVAL '+ 1 day')

select sum(select_count) as count, (select product_category from product as p where p.product_no = o.product_no) as product_category from order_product as o right outer join order_table as t on( o.order_no = t.order_no) where order_date > cast(date_trunc('day',current_date) as date) and order_date < (date_trunc('day', current_date) + INTERVAL '+ 1 day')::date GROUP by product_category
